attributes.action: ensure that building firms build a good proportion of affordable homes (ie under £100K)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a shortage of houses but building firms continue to build properties that are beyond the reach of msot first time buyers.

A good number of properties should be built that sell for under £100 so first time buyers have some change of buying them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
